sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <plugin id="com.glide.upgrade_blame" name="Upgrade Blame Tool" version="1.0.0" invalidate_properties="true" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published"> <description>The upgrade blame tool plugin is used to track the affected table records touched (insert/update/delete) by the load files during system upgrade, zboot or plugin activation/upgrade. This plugin adds application modules to allow user with maint role to be able to access the upgrade blame log and to turn on/off the feature. It also adds security access control rules to prevent user from modifying the upgrade blame logs table</description> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>The upgrade blame tool plugin is used to track the affected table records touched (insert/update/delete) by the load files during system upgrade, zboot or plugin activation/upgrade. This plugin adds application modules to allow user with maint role to be able to access the upgrade blame log and to turn on/off the feature. It also adds security access control rules to prevent user from modifying the upgrade blame logs table</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.upgrade_blame</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Upgrade Blame Tool</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.upgrade_blame/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.upgrade_blame</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
